blimpcontrol.magnetometer

Magnetometer module for the blimpcontrol library.

class blimpcontrol.magnetometer.Magnetometer(bus: int, addr: int)

Bases: object

A class to represent the magnetometer.

Parameters:

  • bus (int) – The I2C bus number.

  • addr (int) – The I2C address of the magnetometer.

get_x() → int

Get the raw X-axis magnetometer value.

Returns:

The raw X-axis magnetometer value.

Return type:

int

Example:

mag.get_x()

get_y() → int

Get the raw Y-axis magnetometer value.

Returns:

The raw Y-axis magnetometer value.

Return type:

int

Example:

mag.get_y()

get_z() → int

Get the raw Z-axis magnetometer value.

Returns:

The raw Z-axis magnetometer value.

Return type:

int

Example:

mag.get_z()

get_xyz() → List[int]

Get the raw X, Y, and Z-axis magnetometer values.

Returns:

A list containing [X, Y, Z] magnetometer values.

Return type:

list[int]

Example:

mag.get_xyz()
